content: I have been eating a pretty regular diet, with maybe a bit more dairy than usual before my stomach issues started. I'd say the severity of my bloating and gassiness is around a 7 or 8. I've also experienced some abdominal pain, mostly in the morning. And, oh, I had to see a pulmonologist, Dr. Johnson, on March 10th about my cough, and he ordered a chest X-ray, which revealed that I had developed pneumonia.
